articles.content:

articles.title: 'Jeopardy!': Julia Collins Says Alex Trebek Tried to 'Smooth Things Over' After a Contestant Made a Mean Comment to Her - Showbiz Cheat Sheet
articles.description: While most contestants were good sports when 'Jeopardy!' champion Julia Collins beat them in a game, one player didn't take it so well. After a game, they made a mean comment to her, which prompted host Alex Trebek to step in.
articles.content: High energy, game shows look fun on TV. They can certainly be an entertaining experience for contestants and fans watching at home but theyre also very competitive. Led by longtime host Alex Trebek, … [+3139 chars]
